title: Good for ambience
comment: I am using it to create ambient loops and noise loops for my new album. It's pretty cool. I just wish you could delete individual tracks without scrapping the whole project. That's what kept the fifth star off for me.

title: Really Good
comment: It's a pretty good app. I use it for music and instrumental and it would help A LOT if you didn't have to hold the record button. Also, if you could delete separate tracks without deleting the whole board. Overall, a good start!

title: Awesome!! Snappy mic samples
comment: Exactly what I was looking for.

title: Beautiful app
comment: 5 stars if you add an option for just clicking to start recording (with a countdown) rather than holding the button down? And then have another option for setting a time limit so it stops recording automatically. Those features would allow me to use it as a guitar loop pedal kind of thing? Great app anyways though.
Thanks for the feedback! I'm currently doing an internship right now so I don't have much time to work on this, but I'll definitely look into it during August!

title: Cool idea!
comment: Pretty well put together, it's really hard to make things sound good though.
